163  inline static void abort_in_warning(bool wie_flag)
164  {
165  warn(112, "calling 'abort_in_warning()'; use 'treat_warnings_as_errors()'"
166  " instead");
167  treat_warnings_as_errors(wie_flag);
168  }

229 class plIgnoreMessage {
230 private:
231  unsigned int id_;
232  bool previous_state_;
233 public:
234  explicit plIgnoreMessage(unsigned int id) :
235  id_(id),
236  previous_state_(plError::message_is_ignored(id))
237  {
238  plError::ignore_this_message(id, true);
239  }
240  ~plIgnoreMessage() {
241  plError::ignore_this_message(id_, previous_state_);
242  }
243 };
244 
245 #define THROW_PL_ERROR(n, msg) \
246  do { \
247  std::ostringstream pl_error_m; \
248  pl_error_m << msg; \
249  throw plError(n, pl_error_m.str()); \
250  } while (0)
251 
252 #define PL_WARN(n, msg) \
253  do { \
254  std::ostringstream pl_error_m; \
255  pl_error_m << msg; \
256  plError::warn(n, pl_error_m.str()); \
257  } while (0)
258
